metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4068 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Webmail before 1.0.9and 1.1.x before 1.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a crafted SVG, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-8864.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
